svg.style: outline: none; background: none; top: 0px; left: 0px; display: block; z-index: 1; font-size: 12px;

text.style: dominant-baseline: middle; text-anchor: middle;

font-family: 思源宋体;font-size: 18px;font-weight: bold;font-style: normal;line-height: 140%;max-width: 900px;overflow-wrap: break-word;word-break: break-word;text-size-adjust: 100%;color: rgb(59, 16, 132);

tspan.tspan: 可变参数

tspan.tspan: *args：从此往后的参数被收集为一个元组

text.style: font-family: 思源宋体;font-size: 14px;font-weight: bold;font-style: normal;line-height: 140%;max-width: 896px;overflow-wrap: break-word;word-break: break-word;text-size-adjust: 100%;color: rgb(59, 16, 132);

tspan.tspan: **kwargs：从此往后的参数被收集为字典，必须位于最后位置

text.style: font-family: 思源宋体;font-size: 13px;font-weight: bold;font-style: normal;line-height: 140%;max-width: 897px;overflow-wrap: break-word;word-break: break-word;text-size-adjust: 100%;color: rgb(59, 16, 132);

tspan.tspan: * ：将序列解包为不同的参数

tspan.tspan: ** ：将字典解包为不同的参数
